text: - [Announcer] The footprint is vast.
The well sites, numerous.
Each site, not only producing oil and gas,

but data that energy
producers can utilize.
- We have customers come and ask us

how do they get more
value out of their data?

And this solution enables
taking that operational data

and driving increased
efficiency, reduced downtime,

reduced costs and
reduced carbon footprint.

- [Announcer] The production
optimization solution on AWS

integrates AWS native
services and products

from vetted partners to
ingest, contextualize,
and derive insights from production data,

to help energy producers
increase productivity.

- The solution will increase
production three to 7%.

It will reduce greenhouse
gas emissions by both
making more efficient use of electricity
and reducing venting and flaring.
And that will lead to a reduction

in greenhouse gas
emissions of 10% or more.

- [Announcer] The production
optimization solution on AWS

not only benefits data
scientists who are using
batch data to achieve optimal performance.
It also benefits production engineers.

- Production engineers typically
oversee maybe 150 wells

and spend two hours reviewing
daily production volumes

to identify which of those
wells need attention.
To drive incremental production.
And that that data analysis is
time consuming and error prone.

This solution provides
production engineers with

a production dashboard
that shows which wells
need attention in priority order.

To be able to drive that
incremental production.

It makes recommendations
on which parameters

to change through either
manual or automated updates.
So this solution can be deployed
as an off the shelf application

from one of our two technology
partners, Ambient and Zecta.

Or it can be implemented
as a custom application.

Natively built on AWS
either by the customer

or with help from one of our
system integrator partners,
AWS Professional Services or SoftServe.

- [Announcer] The production
optimization solution

is part of AWS's larger
production operations

solutions portfolio, designed
to help energy producers

harness data to achieve
optimal performance.

Start the conversation today
about production optimization
on AWS and how it can help benefit
your upstream energy production.
